about_SE.title: Meet Bruno
about_SE.name: I'm Bruno Guimarães da Silva
description: I'm a full-stack software engineer specialized in building scalable, secure, and high-performance systems. My experience combines robust backend development (PHP and Go) with modern frontends using Next.js, Vite, Remix Run, and TypeScript. I focus on turning complex business problems into clean, maintainable, and efficient solutions through good architecture and code quality.

I'm currently based in Brazil and working again at Gazin, one of the largest retail and distribution companies in the country. I collaborate on the evolution and modernization of corporate applications — including refactoring legacy monolithic systems, integrating distributed services, and creating microservices ready for production.

I have solid experience with Oracle and advanced SQL (performance tuning, PL/SQL, indexing, CTEs, execution plan analysis). I've optimized critical routines, reducing processing times from minutes to seconds through modeling, refactoring, and query optimization.

Even while working on a large-scale project, I'm open to new opportunities — including international projects, remote positions, consulting, and relocation. I have experience collaborating with global teams, strong communication skills, and adaptability to multicultural environments.

I'm driven by challenges and curiosity. I enjoy taking legacy or overly complex systems and transforming them into modern, predictable, and scalable architectures. Outside of software, I build custom gaming PCs, advise people and companies on high-performance hardware, and cook Italian and Portuguese dishes — always with the same attention to detail and quality.
